title: (31300) Tafalla - 2 Calle el Saso
description: Municipal space for motorhomes of Tafalla. Sewage pit, fountain. Services are not always open. Parking is open all year round for 48 hours. All for free. Municipal territory of Tafalla motorhome. Coffin of black water, supply, electricity and services, it has services is the only thing that is not always open, if they let you be 48h. Everything is free.

title: (31300) Tafalla - Carretera de la Zona Media
title_short: (31300) Tafalla - Carretera de la Zona Media
description: Flat space under the pines with sun and shade. Possibility of spending the night, the road is 100 meters but there is little passage.

title: (31300) Tafalla - 2 Calle Olleta
description: Parking usable by tourists really quiet and free, even water. the oil changes are done at the back of the ground on the right. Happy holidays to all.

title: (31300) Tafalla - s/n Avenida Pamplona
description: LPG easy to get to and a good price next to two supermarkets and a good laundromat behind Aldi

name: Camping Olite
title: (31390) Camping Olite
description:
Olite, NA-115.
Campsite with vacant lot in the background. Sanitary and electricity access. Very calm. Ideal for a night passing through the region. 5

title: (31300) Tafalla - 7 Polígono Fuente el Rey Pabellón-C
title_short: (31300) Tafalla - 7 Polígono Fuente el Rey Pabellón-C
description: LAUNDRY - The place is clean, the machines are modern.

title: (31390) Olite - Carr. Tafalla - Fitero
description: Located in a sparse forest. We arrived at night by 4x4 from the harvested field nearby but the place seems easily accessible by the roads. Quiet place.

title: (31390) Olite - 13 Calle Falconera
description: Residential area with large and quiet parking. If the area is full it is a good option for a couple of nights.

title: (31390) Olite - 2014 Diseminado Diseminados
description: picnic area. Direct access is prohibited. no possibility for straight parking. Place with wooden and stone tables to eat. Covered areas for shade. It has junk. Located right on the river.

title: (31390) Olite - 3 Plaza del Fosal
description: Parking in very good condition: clean water and drainage. Perfect area to visit the city and its small streets as well as its very well restored castle. in the end, not so noisy. We stayed here for 2 nights during the village festivals. I recommend.

title: (31390) Olite - 2020 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Picnic area with stone bench. In the sun in the morning, in the shade in the evening. a small stream passes at the foot of the bridge, magical. rather for van than large CC

title: (31394) Pueyo - 1 Calle Tejería
description: In the hills near the village. Accessible via a gravel road. Unfortunately, the road there is currently a bit washed out (see photos). The byway is straight and flat. Great view of the hilly landscape. We felt, in the middle of nature, very well!

title: (31390) Olite - N-121
description: Picnic area next to the road. To stop to eat. Noisy on the road.

title: (31394) Pueyo - 3 Calle Venta Nueva
description: We were quite tired because of the road, so quite desperate to find a place to sleep. Until we found this spot, a bit off road parking where big trucks and a caravan were parked. So we decided to stay.

title: (31140) Artajona - 4 Calle las Piscinas
description: Gravel area with gray and black water drainage. Source for filling. Perfect for visiting the city.

title: (31253) Miranda de Arga - 37 Calle Dehesa
description: New motorhome parking in Miranda de Arga, next to Paseo del Arga, a green and central area. Locality with food stores, cafeteria, bars, restaurants, canning shop and pharmacy .... Recommended excursions to Torreon, hermitage of Vergalijo or hermitage of San Juan. BTT routes. Capacity 2 motorhomes, soon they will connect water.

title: (31140) Artajona - NA-6020
description: Picnic area with a lot of shade, with a fountain and ample space to park. Very close to the access of the Cerco, a fort that is worth visiting.

title: (31253) Miranda de Arga - 37A Calle Dehesa
description: New motorhome area opened in Miranda de Arga, behind the ambulatory, past the soccer field, first street on the left. (Services at the end of the street water and feces). New area in the middle of nature, green area, shade, barbecue, picnic tables and chairs, children's area, sports area, soccer field, on the Paseo del Arga, with views of the Arga, quiet but central and safe next to the barracks of the civil guard, next to the swimming pools and municipal bar. The area consists of 3 spaces at the beginning and 4 at the end, with a turning area for a better parking maneuver, large spaces, and in the central area there are tables, chairs and a barbecue. Town with food stores, tobacconist and gift shop, workshop, pharmacy, craft preserves shops, bars, restaurant. MTB routes, recommended walks to the hermitage of Vergalijo, El Angel, El Torreón... The service area is about 150 meters at the end of the street next to the Civil Guard barracks, for emptying black & grey waste & filling fresh water.

title: (31140) Artajona - Camino Cercondoa
description: An outdoor parking allows to visit the wonderful medieval Circus Artajona in the upper town. Better access from the Jerusalem chapel instead of passing through the village. Night possible. No services or supervision.

title: (31253) Miranda de Arga - 1A Avenida San Benito
title_short: (31253) Miranda de Arga - 1A Avenida San Benito
description: Quiet area near the center of the village. Park with fountain and public swimming pools nearby. Very calm.

title: (31495) San Martín de Unx - Calleja Zapata
title_short: (31495) San Martín de Unx - Calleja Zapata
description: New area under construction next to the municipal swimming pools that allows access to large format AC, now not possible in the parking indicated in PN.

title: (31495) San Martín de Unx - 7 Calle las Eras
title_short: (31495) San Martín de Unx - 7 Calle las Eras
description: Parking for motorhomes near the quiet and free center with six seats

title: (31392) Pitillas -
description: Small grass and gravel car park at the foot of the Santo Domingo hermitage. Flat, on the edge of a rural road with little traffic. Nice view of a beautiful sunset. From the top of the hermitage there is a good view of the lagoon. Plenty of parking space at the foot of the hermitage.

title: (31395) Mendívil - 2 Calle la Fuente
description: Picnic area with tables next to the river. With water source. Quiet town.

title: (31251) Larraga - 51 Carretera Estella
description: Vehicle parking area vans and caravans. It is a very quiet area with good views and a well maintained garden. It has a fountain and is 5 minutes walk from the town center where are all the services. Please leave comments for possible improvements. Thank you

title: (31251) Larraga - 64 Carretera Balsa
description: New motorhome area in Larraga, in the city's sports area and swimming pools. 7 places with electricity, picnic areas, green area, emptying and filling services, near the center, at the moment it is free but payment with an application is going to be installed. Town with bars, restaurants, shops, routes for walking, paddle tennis...

title: (31494) Leoz -
description: Windmill of Olleta. Well renovated, picnic tables. A nice view on each side and the possibility of enjoying the freshness of an open hall. It is accessed by a small road that runs alongside the wind turbines. Possibility to park and enjoy the view for a meal break or at night. But the wind turbines next door are relatively noisy.

title: (31392) Pitillas - NA-5330
description: Parking Pitillas Lagoons, bird watching center. 3 tours start from the center. Dog forbidden. No shadow at all.

title: (31496) Ujué -
description: Watchtower parking lot. Nice view over the valley. Close to the road but little traffic in the evening. It is not quite flat but by searching a little I did not need to put the shims. To be deplored: the papers and other waste on the ground.

title: (31370) Falces - 2 Calle Mota
description: Quiet area beside the sports area, a 5-minute walk from the Centre. Recreational area with tables available. 48 hours maximum.

title: (31370) Falces - s/n Carretera a Lerín
description: Shady picnic area before entering the town of Falces. Easy access and plenty of picnic tables. Very close to the river.

title: (31496) Ujué - 1 NA-5311
description: Small esplanade by the road (very, very little traffic), no houses around. On one side, a splendid view of the Spanish countryside, on the other a superb view of the pretty village of Ujue.

title: (31496) Ujué - N-5310
description:
A 360 degree view on top of a hill, 
it is a wonderful place surrounded by views,
no problem to drive up with a camper

title: (31392) Pitillas -
description: Gravel path leads to beautiful free place in nature. Enjoy the peace and the beautiful view. Pay attention in rainy weather; soil is made of clay. Keep the place clean with respect for nature.

title: (31496) Ujué - NA-5310
description: Picnic tables of stone, under pine trees, at the edge of the little busy road with beautiful views of the perched village of Ujué.

title: (31496) Ujué - NA-5310
description: A few minutes walk to the town and the views here are spectacular across the rolling hills to the snow-capped mountains. Very peaceful at night. Highly recommended. This is the closest viable parking area for a motorhome to the town. There are other spots through the village where the very narrow route might suit a small camper van.

title: (31150) Larraga - NA-6031
description: Large picnic area next to a hermitage. There is a fountain and many tables. It's a forest area and it's perfect for spending a night in nature in a van. Next door is the Roman city of Andelos, which can be visited, which has toilets but closes at night even though their "parking lot" is outside. It's a very quiet place, in the middle of nowhere. The last section is a gravel area, unpaved.

name: Ermita de San Martín
title: (31154) Ermita de San Martín
description: Parking in hermitage SAN Martín de ainorbe, very good view, quiet place but without water or bathroom

title: (31396) Unzué - NA-5010
description: Spot in the middle of nature shaded far from the easy access road dirt track starting point of hiking and mountain biking trails.

title: (31496) Ujué - 2 Camino de Redondiaga
description: Flat parking, without service. Very calm to sleep. Next to the village.

title: (31496) Ujué - Carretera de las Muelas
description: Quiet parking behind the ruins of the church. View of the village. Splendid view. Slightly sheltered from the wind. Quieter than the center car park.

title: (31396) Unzué - 8 Calle San Millán
description: Going up towards Unzué, follow the indication to the left of Parking (P), it does not appear on Google Maps, it must be quite new. Gravel parking, about 30 delimited spaces. 2 picnic tables and a fountain with drinking water. A paved track goes directly to the town. There are no height limits, and no overnight prohibition. There is a very nice circular excursion to climb the Peña Urzué with good views.

title: (31150) Mendigorría - Carretera Obanos - Lerín
description: A nice dirt stop near a bridge, a road leading down to river, it could be accessed by smaller vans. River is nice to swim in, rocky bottom.

title: (31150) Nuestra Señora de Andión -
description: Parking set back, open countryside. magnificent view

title: (31150) Mendigorría - km. 1 Carretera Puente la Reina
title_short: (31150) Mendigorría - km. 1 Carretera Puente la Reina
description: Picnic area with several ravines and a large car park at the foot of the village.

title: (31396) Unzué - 32-B1 Calle San Millán
description: Small parking facing the church. Slightly sloping (easily correctable). We stayed here for one night and two days without being disturbed. Very little passage, only the church that rings without being disturbing so far.

title: (31396) Unzué - 15 Calle la Peña
description: Fabulous views from cemetery above Unzué village. Small road to access but doable in our 20 year old van :-)  Peaceful night although windy, greeted by a local walking his dogs during breakfast

name: Camping El Molino
title: (31150) Camping El Molino

title: (31398) Olcoz - 9 Calle Muskilda
description: Parking in town square, emblematic place with olkotz tower and spectacular views

title: (31496) Navarra - NA5311

title: (31380) Caparroso - 2 Camino Cementerio
description: A car park next to a hermitage. Garden with picnic tables, fountain, swings for children, trees with plenty of shade in summer.

title: () Unzué - Unnamed Road
description: Parking a little inclined to the ground. Is located on the outskirts of Pamplona by the diversion of quarries. Path with stones without problem for van. The parking lot is focused on climbing the area at the Penaartea or the Carrascal!

title: (31395) Leoz - NA-5100
description: Flat and wide grassy area next to the road, very comfortable and quiet place

title: (31250) Oteiza - Carretera de la Zona Media

title: (31380) Caparroso -

title: (31152) Muruzábal - NA-6063
description: Perfect for cool water. The place is very charming with its small church.

title: (31380) Caparroso - 47 Avenida de Pamplona
description: A place to park and spend the night with picnic tables among young trees that do not give much shade, some swings for children. There is a gas station that is 200 m. walk, has a bar-restaurant

title: (31314) Santacara - 26 Prolongación Baratas
description: Free motorhome area with all services except electricity. Unmarked pitches with capacity for approx 12 motorhomes. Quite level, we do not need chocks. Illuminated and fenced.

title: (31380) Caparroso - 62 Avenida de Navarra
description: It is a public car park, for about 10 vehicles in a quiet place among trees. It has tables and benches next to it to eat. All the services that I describe are located in the town. Everything within walking distance.

title: (31380) Caparroso - 8 Calle el Ferial
description: New car park near the football stadium, no ban for CCs. We stopped for lunch. Not tested at night

title: (31380) Caparroso -

title: (31315) Murillo el Cuende - Unnamed Road

title: (31100) Puente la Reina - 12 Calle Cañada Real

title: (31100) Puente la Reina - 1 Camino

title_short: (31100) Puente la Reina - 7A Camino Viejo Mañeru

title_short: (31494) Eslava - Carretera de la Zona Media

title: (31100) Puente la Reina - 8 Calle las Huertas
title_short: (31100) Puente la Reina - 8 Calle las Huertas

Without services (there is a source to fill the tank and the City Council plans to set up a space for loading and unloading water), with a supermarket nearby and the town center at hand.

title: (31494) Eslava - Unnamed Road

title: (31340) Marcilla - 2 Calle el Cid

title: (31152) Muruzábal - 1 Calle las Eras
description: Parking near the pediment without service. Food in the village.

title: (31250) Oteiza -

title: (31340) Marcilla - Avenida Complejo Deportivo

title: (31382) Mélida - 31A Calle Fueros
description: A very quiet place next to the sports center

title: (31350) Peralta - Helipuerto

title: (31493) Gallipienzo - Unnamed Road

title: (31260) Lerín -

title: (31260) Lerín - 1 Calle Yesera

title: (31250) Oteiza - Carretera de la Zona Media
title_short: (31250) Oteiza - Carretera de la Zona Media
description: Stopping area with small pine forest. No tables or chairs. Ideal for a rest stop.

title: (31360) Funes - 5 Paseo de La Mejana
description: Dirt parking near the river. many mosquitoes

title: (31133) Legarda - Autovía Camino de Santiago

title: (31133) Legarda - A-12
description: On the highway, free gray / black water service, filling if you make fuel. If you don't refuel filling is more expensive. Direction Pamplona there is no restaurant, the restaurant is in the direction of Puente la Reina.

title: (31360) Funes -
description:
Parking and field next the a cemetery. Has trash containers. Large fields next to to have a view.

Great area for mountain biking, there are many single track trails.

title: (31119) Campanas - Av. Zaragoza, 10
description: Inexpensive gas station (vending machine) with drinking water

title: (31493) Gallipienzo Antiguo - 18B Calle Mirador
description: Especially not to enter the village (very complicated U-turn) 2 to 3 places at the roadside for the visit of the village "sporty" walk but breathtaking landscape

title: (31493) Gallipienzo Antiguo - 15 Calle el Sol
description: Mirador street. Before entering the town there are some containers marked Hotel Heredad Beragu. Continue along that street and there is a small parking lot for 4 vehicles. Print views. Routes to see 2 churches and hermitage. Route to see the Roman bridge ideal for fishing and bathing. Only parking. There is no emptying or loading, although you have several sources around town. Spectacular town

title: (31473) Abínzano - Unnamed Road
description: In nature

title: (31131) Cirauqui - 5 Calle Aniz
description: Quiet land parking for the night without services, a small town that surprised us and is worth seeing, mountain biking tours in wikiloc and some curious places walked, Roman road, walks through the countryside. Playground behind the parking lot with a bar.

title: (31360) Funes -
description:
Super spot on a ridge with a 360 view of the valley next to a small chapel. Beautiful sunset/sunrise.

You can find the water point when you walk to Jesus via the left side.

Also great area for mountain biking.

title: (31133) Legarda - NA-6016
description: Picnic area with a few tables in the sun, magnificent panoramic view of the surroundings.

title: (31191) Subiza - NA-6056
description: Parking area on the heights in the middle of the wind farm. quiet. accessible by converted van. flat terrain.

title: (31310) Carcastillo - NA-128
description: Free, tarmac and shaded car park located in front of the La Oliva monastery next to the Bardénas Réales desert. Presence of garbage cans. Quiet night.

title: (31360) Funes -
description: Public parking in the middle of nature. Outings of hiking and mountain biking routes. Barranco de Peñalen one of the 7 wonders of Navarra.

title: (31191) Galar - NA-6056
description: Large, flat gravel area at the top of Pedrón ridge. Very windy - there are many wind power plants around.

title: (31360) Funes - Unnamed road
description: Be careful that around March April it is flooded. Beautiful place, with a river next to it, a pebble beach. Easy access with a van

title: (31330) Villafranca -
description: Flat place along a forest path. Very quiet for the night. There is a river nearby as well as the start of the steps. The path is not suitable for large vehicles because it is narrow and dented

title: (31360) Funes - Unnamed Road
description: Camping spot in the countryside, at the edge of the river. Access by a small path (minimum ground clearance required), the ground is pebble. In the shelter of the wind, shaded spots. Frankly, little paradise

title: (31261) Andosilla - 4 Calle Ana de Velasco
description: Quite big parking. In the town hall square there is a fountain. The sports center is next door where there are showers. You are in the heart of the town, there are several shops and bars next door. If you want to visit the town it is a good place to park.

title: (31330) Villafranca - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place! not that easy to get to but definitly worth to find the way. No people around. No noise besides water river sounds. Little paradise.

title: (31261) Andosilla - 23 Calle Virgen de la Cerca
title_short: (31261) Andosilla - 23 Calle Virgen de la Cerca
description: Parking behind the soccer field. It has garbage and benches. The municipal swimming pools are next door. The pool bar where you can have lunch and dinner. Following the paved road you reach the river, where there is a fountain and benches to sit on. You can also go down to the river where there is a mini beach to be able to be.

title: (31330) Villafranca - Unnamed Road
description: Spot next to the river. Very quiet and beautiful views. In the morning, the locals that passed on their sunday walk were friendly

title: (31470) Noáin - Calle Camino Otano
description: Small space by the river, we ate there for lunch, it was very pleasant. Possibility to sleep but not tested

title: (31493) Gallipienzo Nuevo - 9 Calle Nueva
description: Land field next to the pediment (open all year round, with a fountain and picnic area) and an olive grove. Side access to the pools (open in summer and with grills). Bar-Restaurant in the village. Grocery store. Walks on foot, bike through paths. 15´ Kaparreta Nature Reserve and Roman bridge. Walks to the old town. Many routes. 2 rivers (Aragon and Indusi) to bathe in 3 minutes.

title: (31380) Caparroso - N-121
description: Perfect for resting or eating.

title: (31191) Beriáin - 2 NA-5007
description: Beriain industrial estate, next to the pond. On the weekend there was no problem for parking where the factories. They usually go on to make a bottle

title: (31570) San Adrián -
description: On a mound dominating the city of Saint-Adrien great quiet splendid view over the valley unfortunately come there only in dry weather no service

title: (31470) Yárnoz - 12 Calle Santa María
description: Very quiet parking to take a break with views, waterfall of the canyon diablozulo 15 minutes walk

title: (31190) Basongaiz - NA-6056
description: A big parking area.  Near some eolic towers. With a pic-nic area.  And a nice point of view. Amplio parking Cerca de unas torres eolicas.

title: (31330) Villafranca - 14 Calle Castillo
description: Cement parking and completely leveled, has a pole with water.

title: (31191) Beriáin - 7 Calle San Francisco Javier

In the town there are all kinds of services and 5 minutes walk, bus stop line 16 to Pamplona (25/30 min)

title: (31491) Sada - NA-5140

title: (31310) Carcastillo - 87 Calle Carretera
description: Area for motorhomes in Carcastillo

description: Shaded area with tables to stop for lunch.

title: (31500) Caparroso - Camino las Bardenas Reales

title: (31471) Monreal - 22 Calle Barrio Abajo

Quiet parking, in front of barbecues, picnic tables, river and Roman bridge.

The town is beautiful, very quiet. Just behind the parking lot is the Camino de Santiago.

Play park and municipal swimming pool 1 block away.

Great to spend 1 day.

title: (31264) Aberín - Carretera al Campo
description: Small area on the banks of the river Ega, following a track from Aberin.

title: (31570) San Adrián - 59 Calle la Isla

title: (31310) Carcastillo - NA-534
description: Mirador de Larrate. Picnic tables available, a quiet place to picnic and why not spend a night

title: (31460) Leache -

title: (31191) Esparza - 15 Calle de Errekatxar

title: (31100) Villanueva - Calle Sta. Agueda

title: (31570) San Adrián - 9D Avenida Navarra

title: (31490) Cáseda - NA-5321

name: Camping Bardenas

description: Drinking fountain

title: (31473) - NA-2420

title: (31262) Allo - Unnamed Road

title: (31570) San Adrián -

title: (31490) Cáseda -

title: (31291) Guirguillano - NA-7040
description: Small earthen car park at the top of a small pass. Lake view. Roadside, but quiet and quiet. Very good for a stopover. Surely nice walks to do in the surroundings.

title: (31263) Dicastillo - 24 Calle Tejería
description: Free parking for motorhomes and vans. Next to the municipal swimming pools. In the foothills of Montejurra, ideal for practicing all kinds of sports (hiking, trail, mountain biking...)

title: (31110) Noáin - 13 Calle Navarra
description: Parking in Noain next to the Parque de los Sentidos. There are long squares somewhat inclined and other flat ones. Bakeries and super close. Next to the airport, although it is quiet.

title: (31330) Cadreita - N-121

title: (31292) Alloz - Unnamed Road
description: A flat space on the edge of a small canal. very calm. Located behind a large monastery.

title: (31490) Cáseda - NA-534
description: Parking with benches. We just took a break there to eat and do the dishes (there is a small fountain of non-potable water). I think it is possible to spend the night there without problem. Close to the road, but the view is nice!

title: (31110) Noáin - 7 Calle Merindad de Pamplona
description: It is a parking lot at the back of the hotel, flat, discreet and sheltered from the north winds. Easy to get to and well connected

title: (31292) Lácar - 7 Calle Berviste

title: (31132) Villatuerta - 2 Calle Regueta
description: Sports center parking, public day and night, no services, 5 min center of town walking, possibility of entering the services of the sports center (bathrooms, swimming pool, showers, bar, picnic area), night without noise and very quiet.

title: (31560) Azagra - NA-6510
description: The Boat of Azagra. Area on the Ebro river, tables and barbecues. In summer chiringuito to dine on the grill. Ample parking with plenty of shade. It is a couple of kilometers from the town by a paved road in very good condition. Flooding area during floods of the Ebro River

title: (31460) Aibar - 20 Calle del Cerco
description: Great place to sleep, on top of the mountain with great views. Little shade Without services Little circulation by day, almost nobody comes at night.

title: (31291) - NA-7171
description: Alloz reservoir.  Small parking on the dam overlooking the lake and the surrounding area.  No services.

title: (31192) Tajonar - 10 Calle la Fuente
description: Tajonar town area, with a children's park, fountain (summer), picnic areas, and a natural grass soccer field (open to everyone)

title: (31449) Nardués - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with tables and chairs under the pines. Flat parking area near the mills but not much heard. There is shadow. We had a very nice night. There is coverage. Walking paths. The path leads to the Biscay fridge. It is on a gravel road, but the ascent is on asphalt from the road to Lumbier or on a stone road from Aibar. Further down treetop park and pools for bathing.

title: (31460) Aibar - Unnamed Road
description: In the middle of a wind farm. The huge mills do make some noise, but it didn't bother me at all, and actually it's impressive to have them so close. Some cars and cyclists passed throughout the day.

title: (31460) Aibar - Carretera de Cáseda
description: Place to eat with drinking water, snacks and shade

title: (31192) Tajonar - Unnamed Road
description: Parking / open space. Behind the sports city of CA Osasuna. dead end road We spent the night without any problem, very quiet place. dimly lit, totally flat gravel asphalt.

title: (31110) Noáin - 19 Carretera Pamplona
description: Repsol service station equipped with laundry facilities. Tokens to buy at the cashier. Water available. Loan of the Spanish LPG adapter.

title: (31449) Nardués - Antigua Carretera a Jaca
description: Rest area with three stone tables and seats. On the side of a very little traveled road. You can hear and see the national in the background. With some shade.

Up into the mound, beside cemetery and behind pediment a field of grass able for a frew vans.
water aside path through town, park place down the church walking Cross Bridge.

title: (31192) Zolina - 29 Calle el Concejo
description: Great spot for 1 night or more and ideal to go and visit the city Pamplona if you have bikes with you. Near start point of many hiking trails and nice picnic spots at 50 meters. The lake at 250 meters is estonishing.

description: Picnic table and source of drinking water according to a local

title: (31449) Aldurnate - Antigua Carretera a Jaca
description: Beautiful Picknick area! Very quiet and peaceful! Mostly no traffic even though it is next to a road. Lots of space and you could easily stay for a night.

title: (31180) - 3 Emakumearen Plaza
description: Free parking area for 4 motorhomes and for many more with an enabling card, (pay attention to the signs). Quiet neighborhood area with gas station, bars, bakery, bus to Pamplona and supermarket.

title: (31191) - 2 Paseo Comercial Galaria Calle S
description: Automatic car wash with a maximum height of 2.90, width max. 2.38 and maximum length of 7 meters. It cannot be accessed with a bike rack. Ideal motorhomes and vans. There is also a manual washing box especially high for vans and motorhomes, it has a ladder to clean the roof.

title: (31263) Arellano - Unnamed Road
description: Ample parking in the middle of nature

title: (31291) Lerate -
description: Guarded parking, the guard allowed us to spend the night in this idyllic setting alone in the parking lot with a 360 degree view 2 minutes from the lake with swimming parasol for tanning to discover

title: (31240) Aberín - Unnamed Road
description: Ideal place for a stopover, flat and very quiet. There is a picnic area with a viewpoint from where you can see the Monestary d'Irache, the valley and the surrounding mountains. Starting point for hikes to Montejurra and Ermita de San Ciprian. The last part of the climb is a gravel road, a bit steep and bumpy in parts. Night forbidden

title: (26550) Rincón de Soto - 77 Diseminado Rincon Soto
title_short: (26550) Rincón de Soto - 77 Diseminado Rincon Soto
description: Flat car park near the Ebro River with paths and routes for both walking and cycling. It is a park with tables to eat and very quiet on the outskirts of a town. In less than 2km is the town with all services. Ideal to go with children and animals.

description: Speed Queen Laundry Ample parking

description: Quiet place at the entrance of the town, next to the bus stop. Nice views.

title: (31293) Sesma - 36 Paseo de la Paticuesta
description: Quiet place to spend the night, practically no noise, well lit and easy access to the same town square where you can also park. Right next to the municipal swimming pool. Drinking water source. We asked the local police about the permissiveness to spend the night and they told us that without problems. Very nice town with good views.

title: (31176) Villanueva de Yerri -
description: Great place by the azure lake, easy access by a good road, sometimes some locals will come with a dog

title: (26500) Calahorra - 29 Avenida de Valvanera

title: (31240) Ayegui - 14 Calle Camino Montejurra
description: LA TEJERA FOUNTAIN Large and very quiet car park, sufficiently level, protected by cypresses, with picnic area and fountain. All services (including sewage discharge) in the town. Many routes to stroll through forests or vineyards. Hard to get lost, there are no visual references.

title: (26500) Calahorra - Calle Mediavilla
description: Parking with service, by the river, at the entrance of Calahorra. Abundant number of places, good place to sleep, but a bit noisy until 9pm because the kids play football in a field right next to the park. We were in early March so we do not know what will happen in the other months of the year with good weather or bad weather. It is very close to the center on foot.

title: (26500) Calahorra - 2 Avenida La Rioja
description: Area next to a green park with beautiful trees. The parking lot which was previously was empty and without shade ... great, cool and you can take a nap in the park. Very close to the center. Small vehicles only.

title: (31174) Echarri - 7 Calle San Esteban
description: Town fountain, with untreated water but totally suitable for consumption.

title: (26500) Calahorra - 2A Calle Antonio Machado
description: New laundry. 3 washing machines, 3 dryers. Next to it there is a small promenade with bars to liven up the wait.

title: (31240) Ayegui - 5.3 Calle Merindad de Pamplona
description: Quiet place. in a new area. with esqueit park area for soccer and basketball

title: (31589) Sartaguda - NA-123
description: Parking next to the "Parque de la Memoria", an essential visit to remember the suffering caused by the Civil War.

title: (31174) Etxauri - 4 Carretera Otazu
description: Next to the river, next to the pool, it is flat and quiet. There are containers for garbage.

Ermita en la parte alta del pueblo, buen acceso por asfalto.
Tiene alguna mesa con bancos, una fuente, papeleras y árboles que ofrecen buena sombra.
Buen lugar para comer o descansar en tranquilidad.

title: (31580) - 2219 Prolongacion el Soto
description: Super quiet and surrounded by nature.

title: (31200) Estella - 7 Calle los Cordeleros
description: Good place to spend a quiet night.

title: (31200) Estella - 3 Plaza Amaiur
description: Parking at the entrance of Estella, without services and close to the center, 10 minutes on foot

title: (26500) Calahorra - 28A Avenida de los Ángeles
description: Parking of La Planilla pools. We use this parking to spend the night in transit. Quiet night The municipal swimming pools give the plus to cool off while traveling and offer a restaurant with bathrooms from 9 a.m. to 11 p.m.

name: Doshaches
title: (31311) Doshaches
description: It has a cozy parking area to spend the night. There is no fixed point of electricity or water, but it is possible to talk to María Angeles, the owner of the hostel. It has a patio with a hose to catch water and it is possible to extend a cable to have light and whatever is needed. Being in the same environment of the hostel it is possible to access the bathrooms. Lunch, lunch and homemade dinner. In the same hostel there are very docile horses to entertain the little ones.

title: (31209) Ayegui - 91A Camino de Santiago
description: Monastery parking

title: (31240) Ayegui - 87 Calle Carretera
description: Drinking water point by the road, possible to park right next to it. The flow is low.

title: (31009) Pamplona - 14T Avenida de Aróstegui
description: It expanded parking next to the elorz river promenade which joins the Arga river promenade, access to the Etxabakoitz pools, bus stop right in front, car wash 50 meters away with gas bottles, vacuum cleaners, garbage containers, services etc. ..

title: () - Carretera de la Zona Media
description:
✔ Reasonably quiet spot
✔ Great view

title: (31589) Sartaguda - 7 Calle el Polideportivo
description:
Large, quiet parking lot with hardly any traffic.
It has sports facilities and in summer you can enjoy the swimming pools and the bar.
It has a fountain, benches and trash cans.
Right next door is the sports center, with a small climbing wall, in the back there is a paddle tennis court, playground, skateboard, soccer field...
The town center is very close and has bakeries, bars, pharmacies and small grocery stores.
Good location, since it is close to the memory park.
